divs: Sighting DetailsThe three of us were standing in my friends driveway, rural location, very darkskies. We were enjoying the clear dark view of the heavens, picking outconstellations, that kind of thing. We all noticed a tringular formation ofstar-like lights, average star brightness, moving together across the sky fromeast to west. The three-point formation was not rigid. The shape of the tringleseemed to change slightly as the formation moved. We watched for about 2-3minutes until the formation disappeared behind the trees.
Summary: Saw a formation of 3 lights move across the night
